data.text:
Summer training camp. It's an important time 
to further refine Mr. C.B.'s running skills.
data.processed:
<story>Summer training camp. It's an important time 
<story>to further refine Mr. C.B.'s running skills.

data.text: Hah, hah...!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Hah, hah...!

data.text:
Hm, thanks...! 
Haha, it's a bit harsh on the throat!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Hm, thanks...! 
<story>Haha, it's a bit harsh on the throat!

data.text:
So, what's the next menu? 
I want to strengthen my upper body too.
data.name: Mr. C.B.

choices.text: I thought so, so I made a strength menu.
choices.processed: <size=40>I thought so, so I made a strength menu.</size>

data.processed:
<story>So, what's the next menu? 
<story>I want to strengthen my upper body too.

data.text: As expected! Let's get started right away!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>As expected! Let's get started right away!

data.text:
During training, we work together as a team, but 
once that's over, we spend our free time however we like.
data.processed:
<story>During training, we work together as a team, but 
<story>once that's over, we spend our free time however we like.

data.text:
～♪ 
Oh, there it is.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>～♪ 
<story>Oh, there it is.

data.text:
Sea glass. 
You can find quite a bit if you look.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Sea glass. 
<story>You can find quite a bit if you look.

data.text:
Oh, I found a nice driftwood. 
Heh, where did you come from?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Oh, I found a nice driftwood. 
<story>Heh, where did you come from?

data.text:
Yeah. Because it's wonderful, isn't it? 
To have crossed the sea and come this far.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Yeah. Because it's wonderful, isn't it? 
<story>To have crossed the sea and come this far.

data.text: Hey, hurry up and get ready!
data.name: Umamusume A
data.processed: <story>Hey, hurry up and get ready!

data.text:
I'm skipping lunch to enjoy the festival~! 
Let's aim for a complete conquest of the food stalls ♪
data.name: Umamusume B
data.processed:
<story>I'm skipping lunch to enjoy the festival~! 
<story>Let's aim for a complete conquest of the food stalls ♪

data.text: Don't forget about the fireworks after that too!
data.name: Umamusume A
data.processed: <story>Don't forget about the fireworks after that too!

data.text:
The Umamusume head towards the dormitory in a hurry. 
Apparently, there will be a fireworks display at the festival tonight.
data.processed:
<story>The Umamusume head towards the dormitory in a hurry. 
<story>Apparently, there will be a fireworks display at the festival tonight.

data.text: Mr. C.B. also seems to be interested, but...
data.processed: <story>Mr. C.B. also seems to be interested, but...

data.text:
That glass bottle also seems to be from abroad. 
Let's take a look over there too.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>That glass bottle also seems to be from abroad. 
<story>Let's take a look over there too.

data.text:
Yeah, I found a lot. 
You guys look beautiful in the sunset.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, I found a lot. 
<story>You guys look beautiful in the sunset.

data.text:
The sun is beginning to set, 
and faint sounds of festival music can be heard in the distance.

choices.text: It seems there's a festival going on.

data.processed:
<story>The sun is beginning to set, 
<story>and faint sounds of festival music can be heard in the distance.

data.text:
I'll pass. 
I want to watch the sunset here.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I'll pass. 
<story>I want to watch the sunset here.

data.text:
I had a feeling that would be the case based on 
how she didn't react to the Umamusume's conversation.
data.processed:
<story>I had a feeling that would be the case based on 
<story>how she didn't react to the Umamusume's conversation.

data.text:
....I'll let her do as she pleases. 
Her best condition is to be free to move.
data.processed:
<story>....I'll let her do as she pleases. 
<story>Her best condition is to be free to move.

data.text:
Night――as I was working, the sounds of 
fireworks began to ring out in the distance.
data.processed:
<story>Night――as I was working, the sounds of 
<story>fireworks began to ring out in the distance.

data.text:
Even though I wasn't that interested myself, 
when I actually heard the sounds, I wanted to see it――

choices.text: (I wonder if I should go see the fireworks)
choices.processed: <size=39>(I wonder if I should go see the fireworks)</size>

data.processed:
<story>Even though I wasn't that interested myself, 
<story>when I actually heard the sounds, I wanted to see it――

data.text:
Stopping the work I was doing, 
I go outside to watch the fireworks.
data.processed:
<story>Stopping the work I was doing, 
<story>I go outside to watch the fireworks.

data.text:
Suddenly, the image of Mr. C.B. appears in my mind. 
Is this what it means to follow my own feelings honestly――?
data.processed:
<story>Suddenly, the image of Mr. C.B. appears in my mind. 
<story>Is this what it means to follow my own feelings honestly――?

data.text: (Thud)
data.processed: <story>(Thud)

data.text: ――Ah.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>――Ah.

data.text:
As I noticed the sound of a backpack being put down, 
I saw Mr. C.B. right outside the entrance.
data.processed:
<story>As I noticed the sound of a backpack being put down, 
<story>I saw Mr. C.B. right outside the entrance.

data.text: Could it be that you were trying to go see the fireworks?
data.name: Mr. C.B.

choices.text: Oh, yeah... what about that backpack?

data.processed: <story>Could it be that you were trying to go see the fireworks?

data.text: Camping gear. Like mugs and lanterns.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Camping gear. Like mugs and lanterns.

data.text: ...I'm thinking I might as well go see the fireworks after all.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>...I'm thinking I might as well go see the fireworks after all.

data.text:
What a pleasant coincidence. 
You coming? I have a special seat for you.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>What a pleasant coincidence. 
<story>You coming? I have a special seat for you.

data.text:
You can see it well, right? It's a bit far away, 
but thanks to that, there's nothing blocking the view.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>You can see it well, right? It's a bit far away, 
<story>but thanks to that, there's nothing blocking the view.

data.text:
I was watching the sunset, and I could see them preparing fireworks. 
I thought it would be nice to watch them here.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I was watching the sunset, and I could see them preparing fireworks. 
<story>I thought it would be nice to watch them here.

data.text:
I thought it would be fun to go get some camping gear. 
When I left the entrance, you came.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I thought it would be fun to go get some camping gear. 
<story>When I left the entrance, you came.

data.text:
...Heh, what a coincidence. 
You had a surprised look on your face.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>...Heh, what a coincidence. 
<story>You had a surprised look on your face.

data.text:
Yeah. 
Yeah... this is kind of nice. This kind of thing.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Yeah. 
<story>Yeah... this is kind of nice. This kind of thing.

data.text:
It's not a promise, but just by chance. 
It's like we're meeting at the same place.
data.name: Mr. C.B.

choices.text: I'm happy that it will continue from now on.
choices.processed: <size=38>I'm happy that it will continue from now on.</size>

data.processed:
<story>It's not a promise, but just by chance. 
<story>It's like we're meeting at the same place.

data.text: Haha, of course.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Haha, of course.

data.text:
It's like I, who wanted to live freely, 
and you, who dreamed of that, met.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>It's like I, who wanted to live freely, 
<story>and you, who dreamed of that, met.

data.text:
Even the goddess of fate will 
be surprised in the future, I'm sure.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Even the goddess of fate will 
<story>be surprised in the future, I'm sure.

data.text:
Mr. C.B. runs as she pleases. And as her trainer, 
I continue to dream of her.
data.processed:
<story>Mr. C.B. runs as she pleases. And as her trainer, 
<story>I continue to dream of her.

data.text:
The two of us just so happened to be in the same place 
at the same time, as if we had run 
into a close friend while traveling――
data.processed:
<story>The two of us just so happened to be in the same place 
<story>at the same time, as if we had run 
<story>into a close friend while traveling――

data.text:
It was like meeting someone you liked as a child 
by chance on the street. I felt an indescribable joy.
data.processed:
<story>It was like meeting someone you liked as a child 
<story>by chance on the street. I felt an indescribable joy.

title: On the stage of chance, a shared performance
